entry.title: Thursday: Snow mixed with rain. High plus 2.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries this morning. Snow or rain beginning near noon. Snowfall amount 2 cm. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 this afternoon. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 6 this morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM ADT Thursday 23 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Rain or snow. Temperature steady near plus 2.
entry.summary: Snow or rain changing to rain this evening and ending overnight then cloudy with 30 percent chance of rain showers. Fog patches developing this evening. Rainfall amount 10 mm. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light after midnight. Temperature steady near plus 2. Forecast issued 05:00 AM ADT Thursday 23 March 2023
